SAMPLE ESSAY NOTES
TOPIC: advantages and disadvantages of telecommuting (working for a company at home and communicating by computer)
advantages of telecommuting:
save time and money
have control over work hours
have flexibility to deal with crises
disadvantages of telecommuting:
is easier to work face-to-face with people
can develop feeling of camaraderie with people in office
needs less self-motivation in office
